sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import PropTypes from 'prop-types' import { propTypes } from 'react-bootstrap/esm/Image' const Rating = ({ value, text, color}) => { return (
=1 ? 'fas fa-star' : value>= 0.5 ? 'fas fa-star-half-alt' : 'far fa-star'}> =2 ? 'fas fa-star' : value>= 1.5 ? 'fas fa-star-half-alt' : 'far fa-star'}> =3 ? 'fas fa-star' : value>= 2.5 ? 'fas fa-star-half-alt' : 'far fa-star'}> =4 ? 'fas fa-star' : value>= 3.5 ? 'fas fa-star-half-alt' : 'far fa-star'}> =5 ? 'fas fa-star' : value>= 4.5 ? 'fas fa-star-half-alt' : 'far fa-star'}> {text && text}
) } Rating.defaultProps = { color: '#ff4c68' } /*Rating.propTypes = { value: PropTypes.number.isRequired, text: PropTypes.string.isRequired, color: PropTypes.string }*/ export default Rating
